i sure can strassers most in depth vision of what a national socialist system would look like was in germany tomorrow here he propounds the need for the redistribution of property and the deproletarianization of all germans strasser goes into detail and says that the class of property owners are transformed into managers accountable to both the state and the workers themselves the manager owns the majority of the stock in the company so he makes more by managing and performing the work that capitalist actually do however the workers too own a share of their company and engage in profit sharing so that the system of wages is anulled strasser also claims this system will give working germans a say in management of said enterprise public trading of stocks is forbidden and market competition is over ridden by degrees of economic planning from the state such as investments and being a last resort employer for members of the folk who work in no enterprise thus ensuring full employment strassers main objection to capitalism was that the class of industrialists capitalists were able to exercise so much influence while leaving the little guys out of it it was unfolkish to him likewise this was also his reason for rejecting marxism a socialism alien to the germany he saw the marxist theory of dictatorship of the proletariat as replacing one class dictatorship with another which it essentially is he envisioned a future of germans working cooperatively and working together as one single entity rather than worrying just about class interest if you have any questions in particular you can feel free to ask me i will also send you the links to the two most important works by strasser in which his ideology is laid out

i think sniping being good is unhealthy for a game like this specifically because it invalidates a healthy riskreward systemi am against telling people how to play if you want to drop skull town every time and die playing aggro or if you want to camp at the top of a hillbuilding do your thingpassive long range play and camping will make the game more stagnant and generally less exciting if this is the playstyle you enjoy you are allowed to enjoy it but in a game that closes a circle in on you and quite literally tries to force aggression sniping will never feel as good to play against vs midrange or close range fighting its less risk for the sniper and the same reward vs playing aggressively at a much higher risk to the aggressive player for the same rewardif aggression isnt rewarded properly the game will become too passive and eliminate any reason to play aggro which eliminates an entire playstyle a game that rewards aggression however still allows passive players to play their style

that they’d allow the story lines to mean no more end with that after being built up all yearsit just doesn’t seem like the writers would be satisfied with their own work there are many concerns about where this writing is going and how it will end but what seems to be the biggest “what the fuck” moment wasthe night king and why he is so obsessed with killing the three eyed ravenbran brans explanation from episode two “he wants to end this world and i am it’s memory” is not reason enough for how it went down dude controls hoards of wights and white walkers oh and a dragon bran has theon and a few friendswho can apparently grab light on fire and shoot arrows at wights with precision as fast as a machine gun if killing him were the goal he could’ve done it easily instead he insists on doing it himself with his whole army seemingly decommissioned there is hope that the long eye contact moment between bran and the night king will reveal some significance or maybe significance will come when explaining what bran was doing the whole time “the great war” is happening and he was warging if they don’t reveal that he was doing some three eyed raven shit to help the war that sure seems like a waste of time to be flying around as a crow this is someone who we’ve seen warg into people and animals there are dragons there even if they made it a part of the story for the characters to discuss and give answers that would work anything but an abrupt ending to the enemy they’ve been built up for so long with so many unanswered questions sure is unexpected but that’s not a fucking twist just because the views don’t see it coming doesn’t make it good there is plenty time for them to make sense of things and there is a good chance they will if they don’t they’ve butchered some of their own story lines that were built up to have to have an endless amount creative endings george martin needs to voice his opinion and maybe he will after it’s over but there is no way this is how he would’ve had things go that being said by far the most epic episode on tv absolutely flawless even when slowed down and background actions examined perfect actors all brought their a game music beautifully coordinated miguel sapochnik is a perfectionist and knows how to draw out viewers emotions like no one so to be clear the writers are the only ones on the hot seat here
